name: Celebrity Indian Balti - Best Indian Restaurant Birmingham

reviews.text:
After the football match at Villa Park, I came here as I like Indian food.
The atmosphere, taste of food and service are all excellent.
I would love to come here again when I come to Birmingham.

Booked the private room for a business dinner. Very helpful staff during booking process. Good sized room was perfect for our meeting. Staff were attentive without being intrusive. Very good value with generous portions on the banquet menu at ¬£29.95. Catered for halal requirement of many guests.
I was part of a bigger group and we ordered everything in advance. So much confusion among staff bringing wrong dishes out. Once it came out it was good, tasty and well presented.

The service was quick and professional, I was catered to and made to feel very comfortable.

I had tried some appetisers and a chicken curry.

The seasoning, garnish and textures would beautiful. I don't often come to Birmingham but I will be bringing company with me next time.

Many thanks,

A very satisfied guest

Beautiful food ,went early before a show so plenty of room ,big portions and a lovely hot curry ,staff very friendly will return on next visit to Birmingham,second visit oct 2024 ,outstanding food once again ,highly recommendüëç
